title: Blood Rain Bow
info: The Blood Rain Bow is a pre-Hardmode bow which rains 1–3 streams of blood from the sky instead of arrows. Each shot consumes one arrow from the player's inventory. The streams fall in a widespread area where the cursor is pointed, but are blocked by solid blocks. It has a 12.5*1/8 (12.5%) chance to drop from a Wandering Eye Fish or Zombie Merman.
